description:
Put it back to D#/Eb.
Just because Tom said it was an F# octave doesn't mean that's the case. They may play it standard live but just listen to the record, its clearly down a step.
title: Bulls On Parade

description:
The tuning is standard
Proof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyxKJLgfT7A
Morello says the intro is octaves on F#, but notice that he is on the second fret, indicating the tuning is standard.
title: Bulls On Parade
